alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 03 at 6:55AM PST until January 03 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in patchy dense fog. * WHERE...In Oregon, Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. In Washington, Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Routes impacted include Interstate 84 and Oregon Route 11.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
